summary: Test module that validates the Stable Diffusion XL image‑to‑image generation pipeline. It contains fast unit tests using lightweight dummy models to check core operations, configuration options, and edge‑case behavior, integration tests that run a full generation scenario, and specialized tests for the refiner‑only configuration covering attention slicing, model persistence, conditioning variations, and offloading strategies.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, stability, and performance of the Stable Diffusion XL Img2Img pipeline across different configurations before releasing or updating the library, thereby reducing regressions and ensuring a reliable user experience.
